ygData.subject: Sneak
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fellow Bards! I would be really glad if anyone could explain me the use of the sneak skill. I haven t seen one person in the game who could explain me how
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fellow Bards!

I would be really glad if anyone could explain me the use of the sneak
skill. I haven't seen one person in the game who could explain me how it works
and what it really does. It is said that monsters can't hear you when your
sneaking, but I really doubt that this is very usefull. I don't know either
how to use it correctly. Do you have to be in walk mode to start sneaking?
Sometimes I just can't hit the sneak button for hours, i don't know why.
I would really appreciate every kind of help...

Athelas
Tarew Marr, lv 18


---
Sent through Global Message Exchange - http://www.gmx.net
